properties.description: This form is used to enter "metadata" or descriptive information about your image. The form is set for a resource type of still image. For help on how to enter information, consult the how-to document on the CTDA web site Resources for Participants.
properties.title: ASC Image MODS Form
Is This Item A Part of CHI?

properties.description: Use this to select for alternative or uniform titles
properties.title: Type (Only Used for Alternative or Uniform Titles)

properties.description: Recommend Linked Authorities and Vocabularies from LC. NOT USED FOR NAMES AS SUBJECTS.
properties.title: Creator/Contributor Information (Recommended If Applicable)

options.local: Local file or No Authority File Found

properties.title: Assigned Linked ID By Controlled Vocabulary (Optional)

properties.description: Used to Distinguish Creator from Contributor
properties.title: Roles (Required: Creator or Contributor)

properties.description: Enter Marc Relator Terms ONLY found at: Linked Authorities and Vocabularies from LC
properties.title: Role
Assigned Linked ID By Controlled Vocabulary

properties.description: Enter a single date and a qualifier for that date if applicable
properties.title: Enter Single Date

properties.description: Enter a date range. If applicable both or either the start and end date can be qualified
properties.title: Enter a Date Range

properties.description: Used for material, texture, or color (i.e. black and white)
properties.title: Form or Medium (Optional)

properties.description: Enter the IANA MIME Type such as image/jpg, image/jp2, image/tiff, video/mp4, audio/mp3, application/pdf. Search IANA MIME Type List.
properties.title: Format/MIME Type (Required)

properties.description: Used to record the physical details of the resource. For example: 1 map, 12 x 14 cm.
properties.title: Physical Details (Optional)

properties.default_value: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries
properties.title: Ownership (Required)

properties.description: Enter descriptive details that you feel are outside of the Scope And Content Note
properties.title: Biographical and/or Historical Note

properties.description: Examples include MSS or url of the source or parent collection
properties.title: Identifiers Of Source or Parent Collection

properties.description: Recommend Linked Authorities and Vocabularies from LC.
properties.title: Name Subjects

options.local: Local file or No Authority File Found

options.local: Local (file name, barcode, accession number, etc.)
options.hdl: Handle (DO NOT REMOVE OR ENTER DATA)

properties.description: Suggested value: These Materials are provided for educational and research purposes only. The University of Connecticut Libraries hold the copyright except where noted. Permission must be obtained in writing from the University of Connecticut Libraries and/or the owner(s) of the copyright to publish reproductions or quotations beyond "fair use."
properties.title: Statement on Use and Reproduction

properties.description: Suggested value: The collection is open and available for research.
properties.title: Restrictions on Access Statement
